name: Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc.
description: Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc. (HII) is America's largest military shipbuilding company and a provider of professional services to partners in government and industry. Established in 2011 through the spin-off of Northrop Grumman's shipbuilding sector, HII has a rich heritage in naval architecture and engineering, with roots dating back to the 19th century. The company designs and builds nuclear and non-nuclear ships for the U.S. Navy, including aircraft carriers, submarines, and surface combatants, while also providing fleet support services, maintenance, and modernization. HII operates primarily through its two main divisions: Newport News Shipbuilding and Ingalls Shipbuilding. Newport News is responsible for the construction of aircraft carriers and submarines, while Ingalls specializes in building amphibious assault ships and other surface vessels. HII is committed to delivering high-quality products and services that ensure the safety and security of the nation. In addition to shipbuilding, HII offers a range of services including information technology, cybersecurity, and logistics support, solidifying its position as a vital partner to the U.S. Department of Defense. With a focus on innovation and operational excellence, HII is dedicated to sustaining its legacy of delivering advanced capabilities that meet the evolving needs of its customers and support national defense.

seo.meta_title: Huntington Ingalls Industries | Leading Military Shipbuilding and Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Huntington Ingalls Industries, the largest military shipbuilding company in the U.S. Learn about our shipbuilding capabilities and professional services.

faq.question: What does Huntington Ingalls Industries do?
faq.answer: Huntington Ingalls Industries is a major defense contractor specializing in the design and construction of naval ships and providing professional services.

faq.question: When was Huntington Ingalls Industries founded?
faq.answer: Huntington Ingalls Industries was founded in 2011.

faq.question: Where is Huntington Ingalls Industries headquartered?
faq.answer: The company is headquartered in Newport News, Virginia, USA.

faq.question: What types of ships does HII build?
faq.answer: HII builds aircraft carriers, submarines, and amphibious assault ships.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Huntington Ingalls Industries?
faq.answer: K. David McNulty is the CEO of Huntington Ingalls Industries.
